author: dalmat89
body:
Powershell 6 beta 2 Ubuntu 16.04 LTS,  the script exit with the following error :

/usr/bin/sort: invalid option -- 'P' Try '/usr/bin/sort --help' for more information.

Powershell code :

$shares = $shares.GetEnumerator() | where {( $_.value -ne $null ) -and ($_.value -ne "0") } | sort -Property value -Descending | select -first 5

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@dalmat89 Thanks for you report!

Currently "sort" alias for Sort-Object cmdlet is only enabled in Windows PowerShell and in PowerShell Core on Windows - we removed the alias in Unix because of conflict with native command `/usr/bin/sort`.

comments.author: dalmat89
comments.body: Great ! thanks so much for your quick reply
